com.saptarshidebnath.lib.processrunner.process

Interface Runner

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RunnerImpl

    public interface Runner
    Runner interface is the base interface to run any system process. Any Shell script or system command can be executed via this.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Output run()
      Triggers the process or command.
      Future<Output> runAsync()
      Runs the process as a Callable Thread with default priority.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        Output run()
    throws IOException,
           InterruptedException,
           ExecutionException
        Triggers the process or command.
        Returns:
        the Integer exit code for the process.
        Throws:
        IOException - denoting there is an IO problem during writing the log files.
        InterruptedException - there is a problem when writing the logs via thread enabled log handlers.
        ExecutionException - when the threads for disk writing and output reading crash.

      • runAsync

        Future<Output> runAsync()
        Runs the process as a Callable Thread with default priority. The method returns a Future reference from which the response of the method can be retrieved.
        Returns:
        A reference to the Future of type Output from which the user can retrieve the method output.
